mapper.select: select a.id as "id", a.code as "code", a.pos_id as "posId", a.name as "name", a.birthday as "birthday", a.tel as "tel", a.address as "address", a.remarks as "remarks" from oa_intel_toll a where a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into oa_intel_toll( id, code, pos_id, name, birthday, tel, address, remarks ) values ( #{id}, #{code}, #{posId}, #{name}, #{birthday}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: update oa_intel_toll set code = #{code}, pos_id = #{posId}, name = #{name}, birthday = #{birthday}, tel = #{tel}, address = #{address}, remarks = #{remarks} where id = #{id}
